conbody.p: NOTE: This function is available to the user with global administrator privileges only.
To open the configuration window, select "Edit Configuration" from the drop-down menu of the menu bar.
A "Currently Active Configuration" by default is "Altägyptisches Wörterbuch (AAEW)", but if other configurations should be available, they will appear in the drop-down menu above.
A field below shows all available BTS configurations. Expand the "Altägyptisches Wörterbuch (AAEW)", following entries will be displayed:

ol.li: Certainty: upon expanding, three values are displayed: certain, probable or uncertain. No Owner Objects selected.
